Entries.5000001: ItemHarvest/Baby Steps/Parsnip is a recommended crop for novice farmers./Harvest 10 parsnips./24 10/-1/500/-1/true
Entries.5000002: ItemDelivery/Healthy Eel/Evelyn asked for two eels to make delicious fried eel./Give Evelyn two eels./Evelyn 148 2/-1/500/-1/true/Oh my, what fresh eels, just looking at it makes me feel healthy!#$b#Here's some warm tea. Could you wait while I cook this?[614]#$b#I've finished cooking the eel. It's hot, so be careful. Go on, try it.[225]#$b#Is it yummy? oh, I'm glad it suits your taste.$h
Entries.5000003: ItemDelivery/Sculpture Of Nature/Driftwood may seem useless, but it can be a wonderful working material for someone who knows its value, and Leah is one such sculptor. Collect pieces of driftwood for Leah./Give Leah 3 Pieces Of Driftwood./Leah 169 3/-1/300/-1/true/Wow! This driftwood has a really cool shape! I think this one belonged to a very old tree. These things can't be easily obtained.#$b#I can make this a beautiful sculpture. @, Thank you so much for saving me here!$h
Entries.5000004: ItemDelivery/Very Sweet Strawberry/Strawberries are worth growing because they taste good and are quite expensive. Maru likes strawberries, but it's hard to grow because she doesn't have a field./Give Maru 10 Strawberry/Maru 400 10/-1/2000/-1/true/Wow, it's strawberry. Isn't it good to actually farm strawberries?#$b#Strawberries are the perfect fruit even though they are pretty and delicious. It's delicious even if you eat it raw, strawberry jam, strawberry cake, strawberry wine, etc. There's nothing lacking!$h#$b#My dad and I love strawberries! I love my job as an inventor, but I sometimes want to be a farmer because of this strawberry.$h#$b#Try selling the rest of the strawberries on market. I don't know much about crops, but I heard that strawberries are very efficient among spring crops.#$b#But anyway, thank you so much! I'm thinking about eating this strawberry you brought whenever I am gloomy. *Smile*$h
Entries.5000005: ItemHarvest/Fresh Salmonberry Lunch Box/It's the Salmonberry season starting today. Go around the village and collect them, it'll help./Gather 20 Salmonberry/296 20/-1/400/-1/true
Entries.5000006: ItemDelivery/The Annoying Slime/Whenever Clint goes to work in the mine, he gets in trouble with slime interference. Destroy the slime and take the evidence to him./Give Clint 10 Slime/Clint 766 10/-1/1000/-1/true/OH! Are you done already? Thank you for your hard work!#$b#Slime're all mushy, but when they touch me, it hurts a lot.#$b#Also, when mucus gets on your shoes, it keeps sticking to the ground, making it difficult to walk! Don't you agree?$a#$b#If it weren't for their interruption, i could dig twice as many ores! But I think it will be easy to go to the mine for a while because you helped me.#$b#Thank you for helping me. Here's a small gift for the hard work.[349]$h
Entries.5000007: Building/Responsible Cattle Rancher/Build a silo if you want to comfortably store hay for animals. Give Robin the necessary materials and money for construction./To build a silo./Silo/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.5000008: ItemDelivery/Birthday Present For Sister/Haley wants to prepare a special birthday present for Emily./Give Haley 1 Aquamarines/Haley 62 1/-1/400/-1/true/Oh, what a beautiful blue light! I'm not interested in jewelry, but this is so pretty.#$b#Thank you, I won't forget it. *grin*$h
Entries.5000009: ItemDelivery/Jas' Request/Jas wants to make a clams necklace for Marnie. pick up some beautiful clams and give them to jas./Give jas three clams./Jas 372 3/-1/180/-1/true/Wow, they're so white and pretty! I'm going to make a pretty necklace with this. She'll be happy, right?#$b#This is a baked pink cake. you may have a dry mouth so drink this juice too! [221][350]#$b#Thanks for your help, @. hehe.$h
Entries.5000010: LostItem/Pierre's Glasses/Pierre drank too much yesterday and lost his glasses somewhere./Find Pierre's Lost Glasses./Pierre 170 Town 10 13/-1/250/-1/true/You found my glasses! Oh no, my glasses are broken!#$b#You even found it around the playground? What the hell happened yesterday...$s$s#$b#Ouch, my head! I guess I have no choice but to get new glasses then.$s
Entries.5000011: ItemHarvest/Is it a fruit or a vegetable?/People are divided over wether tomatoes are fruits or vegetables, but everyone will agree that spaghetti with tomato sauce is really delicious. Try growing some tomatoes on your farm./Harvest 10 Tomatoes/256 10/-1/500/-1/true
Entries.5000012: ItemHarvest/Garbage Threatens Fish/It is said that plastic bag waste thrown away by urban people threatens the safety of fish. Pick up the trash for the poor fish./Harvest 5 Trash/168 5/-1/500/-1/true
Entries.5000013: ItemDelivery/Dog Days/Jas looks tired from the heat and has no strength to play. Why don't you buy her a cold snack?/Give jas an Ice Cream./Jas 233/5000014/300/-1/true/How did you know I liked strawberry ice cream?#$b#It's so sweet, cold and delicious! Thank you!!$h#$b#Are you wondering what vincent's favorite flavor is? He likes grapes!
Entries.5000014: ItemDelivery/Dog Days/Vincent looks tired from the heat and has no strength to play. Why don't you buy him a cold snack?/Give vincent an Ice Cream./Vincent 233/-1/300/-1/true/Wow, it looks delicious! I happen to wanted a snack! My mom doesn't buy me this often...#$b#@, you're the best! Hehe.$h
Entries.5000015: ItemDelivery/An Unpleasant Smell/Jody says she hates spicy berry very much. But her friend Robin loves it. Jody picks up spice berries off town and wants to present it to a friend./give jody 5 Spice Berry/Jodi 396 5/-1/1000/-1/true/...*sniff*...#$b#What a terrible smell! It smells worse because there are many things gathered!$s#$b#Can you put it on the porch? I'll have Sam deliver it to Robin later!$s#$b#...*sigh*...$s#$b#I don't think I'll ever get used to this smell... Do you think I'm allergic to spice berry?$s#$b#... But anyway, thanks to you, I've got freedom from spice berry that's all over the place.#$b#Now, when I wander around the town, I think I'm less afraid than before. Thank u so much, @! hoho.$h
Entries.5000016: ItemDelivery/Bat Problem/Bats are harming the village crops. Bring Bat Wings to Lewis as trophies./Give Lewis 10 Bat Wings/Lewis 767 10/-1/500/-1/true/Hey, that's pretty bat ass!#$b#I won't have to worry about bats for a while. Thanks for your hard work, @.
Entries.5000017: Crafting/Respect For Nature/If we want to protect nature, we must make recycling a habit. Even things that seem useless can be valuable again./Make a Recycling Machine./20 true/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.5000018: ItemDelivery/High-Protein Routine/Alex needs protein to train his muscles, and eggs are cheap and tasty protein food./Give Alex 7 Big White Eggs./Alex 174 7/-1/1100/-1/true/Wow, these are really big, I thought they were dinosaur eggs!#$b#I'll ask grandma to make me omelets for dinner from now on.
Entries.5000019: ItemDelivery/Sorcerer's Cauldron/The wizard is trying to study a certain potion, but they're running out of purple mushrooms./Give the Wizard 2 Purple Mushrooms/Wizard 422 2/-1/2000/-1/true/You brought it right on time. Thanks to you, I can continue my research.#$b#This will certainly be a good thing for Marlon and the adventurer Guild.
Entries.5000020: LostItem/Elliott's Memories/Elliott's precious watch decoration has been lost. He looks heartbroken, can you help him?/Find Elliott's lost Opal/Elliott 564 Beach 10 11/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, you found it! I'm so happy! It's not an expensive jewel, but it's an ornament filled with memories, it's very precious to me...#$b#What you did for me is very meaningful. I won't forget this favor. Thank you, @.
Entries.5000021: ItemDelivery/Undying Love/George needs a bouquet of fairy roses for Evelyn./Give George 5 Fairy Roses/George 595 5/-1/2500/-1/true/Fairy roses have a beautiful appearance, and a very sweet scent.#$b#Maybe that's why Evelyn loves this flower so much?#$b#Thanks to you, I can make my wife happy today with this gift! Thank you.$h
Entries.5000022: Crafting/To Make A Keg/If you want to make big money, a wine business could be a good choice. Craft a keg to get started./Craft a keg./12 true/-1/1000/-1/true
Entries.5000023: ItemDelivery/Sweet Maple Syrup/Jodi wants to buy quality maple syrup./Give Jodi A Maple Syrups/Jodi 724 1/-1/300/-1/true/Oh my, I was just baking pancakes! Vincent will love it!$h#$b#If i put this maple syrup on, it will be delicious even if it's not cooked. hoho.$h#$b#Oh, Have you had breakfast? You have to eat well. I'll pack some food for you, so make sure you eat at home![211][184]$h
Entries.5000024: Building/Mill Construction/Wouldn't you like to process your own wheat and sugar beets into flour and sugar respectively? Well, if you have a mill, now you can! Provide Robin with the money and materials to build a mill for you./Build A Mill./Mill/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.5000025: ItemDelivery/Special food for Grandchildren/Evelyn wants to cook a special meal for her grandson. she is going to cook his favorite salmon dish./Give Evelyn 2 Salmon/Evelyn 139 2/-1/700/-1/true/You did me a favor again this time. Thank you always, sweetie.$h#$b#If George was a little younger, I would have asked him... I'm worried that I'll keep burdening you.$s#$b#By the way, have you eaten?  Oh, I wish we could eat together, but I'm sorry to hear that you've already eaten....$s#$b#But I don't like letting you go. Won't you wait a minute? I'll get the food right away.$h#$b#Here! This is a hot salmon dinner. I packed it well so that the seaweed doesn't leak out, so eat it when you're hungry. Thank you again! [212]$h
Entries.5000026: ItemDelivery/Bestie/Sam wants to give a gift to his best friend Sebastian. It's hard to believe, but Sam says Sebastian likes bug steak.../Go to the saloon on Friday and give Sebastian a bug steak./Sebastian 874/5000027/500/-1/true/...*Silence*...$a#$b#... @, Did you just tell me to eat this? You're joking, right?$a#$b#what? Sam asked you to give me this as a gift?$a#$b#haha! Did you really believe that? There's no one who would love this.$h#$b#He was trying to make fun of us! Haha!$h#$b#Listen, @. We have to pay back. Could you get me some mayonnaise? If you bring it, I'll tell you why. *grin*$h
Entries.5000027: ItemDelivery/Bestie/Sebastian decided to avenge Sam's prank. To do that, he says he needs mayonnaise./Give Sebastian One Mayonnaise./Sebastian 306/5000028/500/-1/true/Good. Now I'll explain my plan. Do you know what one of Sam's favorite foods is?#$b#That's right, Maple Bar. And I will sprinkle this mayonnaise on a maple bar. All you have to do is go and give him this maple bar. He really hates mayonnaise.#$b#Ah! That doesn't mean he has a mayonnaise allergy, so don't worry! I can already imagine Sam's absurd face... *giggle*[731]$h
Entries.5000028: ItemDelivery/Bestie/Sebastian asked me to give a maple bar full of mayonnaise to Sam as a gift./Go to Sam's house and give him a maple bar./Sam 731/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, @! What was his reaction when you gave Sebastian a bug steak?$h#$b#He looked like he swallowed a shit?Hahaha! The plan was successful!$h#$b#hum? Is this a maple bar?! A reward for having a good time thanks to me? You're welcome! And thank you. It's my favorite snack!$h#$b#...*yum yum*...#$b#Yuck! It's not maple syrup. It's mayonnaise. You two made fun of me, didn't you!?$a#$b#...$a#$b#... Hahaha!!! It was a really fun joke just now. I have no choice but to admit it. it's fun to play with you guys! Hahaha!!!$h
Entries.5000029: ItemDelivery/A Cozy Wool Blanket/Caroline is sensitive to the cold, she wants a new wool blanket. Emily, who is good at sewing, promised to make Caroline's blanket. Give her the necessary wool to speed up the process./Give Emily 5 wool/Emily 440 5/-1/4000/-1/true/Oh, you brought the wool! That’s good.#$b#It hurted me to see Caroline catch a cold every year. Now I can make a thick, warm blanket for her.$h
Entries.5000030: ItemDelivery/Strong Caffeinated Stimulant/Harvey is busy writing a thesis for a medical journal. He needs some strong caffeinated drinks to keep him from sleeping on the job./Give Harvey three triple-shot espresso./Harvey 253 3/-1/4800/-1/true/Oh, my sleepiness disappears as soon as I take a sip!#$b#I am worried that I'll be addicted to this drink in the future.#$b#I better finish my thesis before that happens... *yawn*
Entries.5000031: ItemDelivery/Classical Aesthetics/Elliott likes to write with a feather pen, not a ballpoint pen or fountain pen. His feather pen is old and he wants to buy a new feather./Give Eliott 3 Duck Feather/Elliott 444 3/-1/1500/-1/true/Oh, my. What a nice, soft feather!#$b#If you put these wings on my vintage gold pen, it will give me an antique atmosphere. I really like it!#$b#I live next door to Willie, so it's easy to get squid ink. Also, I'm really lucky to have a friend who gave me such beautiful feathers!$h
Entries.5000032: LostItem/Delivery Mishap/The package of flour that Gus ordered from Juju City was lost during delivery. The saloon's regulars are looking forward to Gus' special fried food, which is a big deal. Find the missing flour for Gus./Find Gus' Flour and Deliver it to the saloon./Gus 246 BusStop 33 6/-1/1000/-1/true/Phew, I almost had to serve salad to the guests who visited me on Friday night. That would've been embarrassing.#$b#It's all thanks to you that I'm able to show off my special fried-food today.#$b#Please wait a moment.#$b#Here, that's my special fried calamari. Thank you again for your kindness today![202]$h
Entries.5000033: ItemHarvest/Cunning Creature/Octopuses are creatures that are hard to see and catch. Willy has challenged you to catch this elusive creature./Catch an octopus by fishing./149/-1/1500/-1/true
Entries.5000034: ItemDelivery/Precious Precious Minerals/Clint wants to create some powerful iridium tools, provide him the materials for it./Give Clint 20 Iridium Ore/Clint 386 20/-1/8000/-1/true/Wow, you must have had a hard time getting this amount of iridium ore. What a hard, beautiful mineral. Thank you! Now, here's your reward.$h
Entries.5000035: ItemDelivery/Play Clay/Penny needs clay for her clay class. Please get her clay so that it can be a fun class./Give Penny 10 Clay/Penny 330 10/-1/1000/-1/true/Oh my! Thank you for helping me prepare for my class!#$b#You must have struggled to get this. There is a lot of dirt on your clothes. *grin*$h#$b#I think it will be a fun class thanks to you. And this is a snack that Mrs. Jody brought before. we can eat it together. Thanks again, @.[651]$h
Entries.5000036: ItemHarvest/Lumberjack/Because of the cold weather, you need a lot of firewood to keep the stove going all day long. The more wood, the merrier, so get out there and get chopping!/Collect 500 wood./388 500/-1/5000/-1/true
Entries.5000037: ItemHarvest/Happy New Year/Your first year in Stardew Valley is almost over. Why don't you bake a nice chocolate cake to celebrate a successful year?/Baking chocolate cake/220/-1/1000/-1/true
Entries.5000038: ItemHarvest/King Of Fish/Legend is called the king of all fish. You'll be widely known as the best fisherman if you catch the Legend. To catch this elusive fish, you must prepare proper food and bait./Catching the legend/163/-1/40000/-1/true
Entries.5000039: ItemDelivery/A General Cleaning/It is good to clean windows or mirrors with wet newspapers. Caroline needs a soggy newspaper to clean up./Go to the SeedShop and give Caroline a soggy newspaper./Caroline 172 1/-1/100/-1/true/All right, we're all set to clean up!#$b#Cleaning up is really annoying, but I didn't manage my house well because I was squatting all winter...$s#$b#Pierre sweeps the floor and Abigail has to do the dishes! And now I have to go to wash the windows. Thanks for your help, @.$h
Entries.5000040: ItemDelivery/New Crops In Spring/Shane, a maniac of spicy food, wants to have a taste of garlic./Give Shane 10 Pieces Of Garlic/Shane 248 10/-1/1500/-1/true/I really like the taste this has in cooking. I'm going to make fried rice with garlic and pepper, my mouth is already watering. *hehe*$h#$b#You worked hard planting this. Here, take this reward.[206]
Entries.5000041: LostItem/Maru's Lost Item/While Maru kept the window open, a crow stole her newest inventions and ran away./Find Maru's Marble/Maru 567 Mountain 5 35/5000042/1000/-1/true/That's my marble, isn't it? I've been experiment with it all day today, but I didn't know this would happen.$s#$b#Glad to find this one, but if you also happen to find my iron bar, bring it to me. please!
Entries.5000042: LostItem/Maru's Lost Item/While Maru kept the window open, a crow stole her newest inventions and ran away./Find Maru's Malachite/Maru 552 Mountain 87 24/-1/1000/-1/true/You've found all my stuff!#$b#Thanks to you, I can continue tinkering with my gadgets!$h
Entries.5000043: ItemDelivery/Lucky Rabbit's Foot./Leah is very nervous for an upcoming competition. It would be nice to give her something that could help relieve some tension, and luck to go along with./Give Leah one lucky rabbit's foots./Leah 446 1/-1/2000/-1/true/Wow, this is a rabbit foot, isn't it? It's a very sensible gift!#$b#I'm not afraid anymore because the rabbit's foot is in my hands. It really puts my mind at ease. You're so sweet, @.$h
Entries.5000044: ItemDelivery/The Jewel And The Cactus/Pam wants to give Penny jewelry, but she says she is too ashamed to give her daughter a present herself./Give Penny 1 Diamond/Penny 72 1/5000045/250/-1/true/Uh... Isn't this a diamond? Mom wanted to give it to me?#$b#I don't know how she bought me this expensive jewelry when she doesn't have a lot of money.$s#$b#I also have a present for mom. If you don't mind, could you do me a favor?#$b#My mom really likes the cactus fruit. She used to talk a lot about the cactus fruit she ate in the desert.#$b#Could you please get the cactus fruit from my mom?
Entries.5000045: ItemDelivery/The Jewel And The Cactus/Penny wants to repay her mother by giving her Cactus Fruit found in the desert./Give Pam 5 Cactus Fruits/Pam 90 5/-1/750/-1/true/Kid, you told Penny that I bought her that diamond, didn't you?$s#$b#I couldn't give you anything, but you always do a lot for me. Sorry, and thank you for being a good friend, kid.$s#$b#And this is cactus fruit, right? Penny gave it to me? Wow, I love these! I'm proud of her. Hahaha! Today is a pleasant day!$h
Entries.5000046: ItemDelivery/Luxurious Delicacies/Lewis is going to serve a meal to his precious guests, and he is looking for something as luxurious as truffles. So, isn't caviar the right choice?/Give Lewis 1 Caviar/Lewis 445 1/-1/1000/-1/true/Oh, I wonder what you can't do. It's hard to make caviar, so I heard a craftsman named caviar master usually works on it.#$b#You are an amazing person who knows how to make caviar like this, not to mention farming, fishing and fighting.$h#$b#To be honest, my job has become very comfortable since I've had someone as versatile as you in town! *giggle*#$b#Anyway, I can provide good meals to guests. I hope they will get a good impression on our village with this!$h
Entries.5000047: ItemDelivery/A Talented Designer/Emily wants to make a beautiful dress, but she can't get the necessary coral dye for her work./Give Emily 5 Coral/Emily 393 5/-1/1000/-1/true/How beautiful the color of the coral is! This will come out exactly the way I imagined now. You're so kind, @.$h
Entries.5000048: ItemHarvest/Colorful Ore/prismatic shard are the rarest ore in the world. This ore is said to be beautiful enough to be recognized from afar./find a prismatic shard./74/-1/5000/-1/true
Entries.5000049: ItemDelivery/For the Gentleman/Clint is interested in skin care. He says he needs red cabbage that is healthy and rich in antioxidants./Give Clint 10 Red Cabbage/Clint 266 10/-1/6000/-1/true/Wow, these are huge. I think with this amount I can eat some every morning for a month.#$b#I like meat, but I need to start thinking about my health. It's depressing...*sigh*$s
Entries.5000050: ItemDelivery/My Little Maple Tree/Vincent is worried that his new friend, the little maple tree, has stopped growing for a long time. What should I do to ease his anxiety?/Go to the forest and give Vincent tree fertilizer./Vincent 805 1/-1/100/-1/true/Hello, @! Hi, @! Are you here to advise me?#$b#What's this? Tree fertilizer?$u#$b#Are you saying that trees like my friend Minguinho need to eat like us to grow fast?$u#$b#Aha! So I just have to sprinkle this fertilizer on Minguinho and wait patiently, right?!$h#$b#Wow- you are a very kind person! Thank you very much! Thank you!$h
Entries.5000051: ItemDelivery/Monkeys Love Bananas/Kent plans to go to an eco-friendly zoo with his family. He needs bananas so his sons can participate in monkey feeding activities./Give Kent 5 Bananas/Kent 91 5/-1/2500/-1/true/Oh, yeah, is this a banana? It's definitely an exotic fruit that's hard to find around here.#$b#I want to try it, so I want to eat it with my family first and use the rest as monkey food.#$b#I hope Jodie and the kids like it. It's been a while since I'm going to play with my family, so I'll have a good time. Thank you.$h
Entries.5000052: ItemDelivery/Wedding Anniversary/Demetrius wants to give Robin a box of peaches as a wedding anniversary present. Help him out by providing the Peaches./Give Demetrius 5 Peaches/Demetrius 636 5/-1/2500/-1/true/@, I guessed you came because I could smell the sweet peaches.#$b#I can't give Robin a peach farm, but she'll be happy with this.#$b#It's really top-notch quality. Thanks, @$h.
Entries.5000053: LostItem/Dwarf's Hat/Dwarf lost his precious helmet while exploring the village at night./Find the Dwarvish Helmet/Dwarf 121 Town 56 68/-1/0/-1/true/That's my helmet! Where did you find that?#$b#Doghouse? dog? What is that? That hairy, tongue-out animal?#$b#ah! I was looking around there yesterday, and I must have left my hat.#$b#This is my favorite hat. It's cool, right? *giggle*
Entries.5000054: ItemDelivery/Electrical Necessity/Sebastian's project is said to have been stopped due to computer power problems. Please help him get the job going./Give Sebastian 5 Battery Packs/Sebastian 787 5/-1/10000/-1/true/Hey, you brought it right away. I think I can use my computer long enough now until the thing is fixed.#$b#Without you, I would have had to put my work on hold. Thank you. @.$h
Entries.5000055: ItemDelivery/An Exotic Dish/Sandy wants to eat Escargot. she doesn't know if it will suit her palate, but she is rather curious about the taste./Go to Sandy's store and give her an escargot dish./Sandy 729/-1/2000/-1/true/Oh dear, You came to see me!#$b#Uh, is that a dish of Escargots? It has a buttery smell to it, and it looks a little gross, but I'll try it!#$b#..*Yum-yum*..#$b#Hmm... Oh, I think this is delicious! The texture is surprisingly good. I was really curious about the taste, but thanks to you, I got to taste it. Thank you, dear.
Entries.5000056: ItemDelivery/A Taste Of Remembrance/Sam wants to give Kent a baked hazelnut. he want to present the taste of the memories that his grandmother gave to his dad./Give Sam 3 Hazelnuts/Sam 408 3/-1/1500/-1/true/This smells so savory!#$b#It's a little embarrassing, but I wanted to cheer up my dad even if I couldn't cook.#$b#@, You're good at cooking, so I'll call on you if I ever need help again. hehe..$h
Entries.5000057: LostItem/Abigail's Ancient Sword/Abigail was walking around the forest and heard a strange noise near the sewers. She lost her ancient sword while she was running away./Find Abigail's Lost Ancient Sword/Abigail 109 Forest 92 82/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, you found my sword!#$b#Didn't you hear a strange sound near the sewers? Oh... It sounded like a pigeon? Hmm... Is it?#$b#What? You're wondering where I got this sword? Yesterday I found it while digging and playing in the woods.#$b#Next time, let's practice with this sword together, @#h!
Entries.5000058: ItemDelivery/Big Hard Yellow Fruit/Krobus wants to eat a very big yellowish hard-skinned fruit./Give Krobus 3 Pumpkin/Krobus 276 3/-1/3000/-1/true/Uh, the fruit I saw back then is right!#$b#P...Pumkin? Pumkin! I won't forget this name.#$b#ah...It tastes just as good as it smells.. It tastes so good!$h
Entries.5000059: ItemDelivery/A Kind Doctor/Harvey usually gives candy to children who visit the hospital. Now he wants to give children healthy candy./Give Harvey 10 Cranberry Candy./Harvey 612 10/-1/4000/-1/true/Oh, it's cranberry flavored candy. But isn't cranberry a little bitter?#$b#Ah- you added apples to hide the bitterness and maximize the sweetness? That's amazing. I'll just try one.#$b#...*yum yum*...#$b#oh! I don't like sweets but this is delicious! But then again, when I was younger, I loved candy too... haha!$h#$b#I hope this will alleviate the children's fear of hospital. Thank you so much.$h
Entries.5000060: LostItem/A Cute Statue Of A Chicken/Marnie lost the chicken statue she was trying to give as a gift to Shane. She came back from Juju City by train and said she seems to have lost the statue on her way home./Find Marnie's The Chicken Statue./Marnie 113 Railroad 43 41/-1/2000/-1/true/Oh, my! You found it, @!$h#$b#Fortunately, it doesn't break and it's okay, except for a little dirt. By the way, where did you find it?#$b#You found this at the train station? Oh,my god.  I keep forgetting things! i must have left it while i were sitting on a chair and organizing my luggage after getting off the train! No wonder my luggage was too light on my way home....*Shaking her head*#$b#Look at this. Her beak is cute, isn't it? I think Shane will love it thanks to you. Here's a little token of sincerity. Thank you, @! [608]$h
Entries.5000061: ItemHarvest/Green Food/They say green food relaxes your body and mind. How about a cup of warm green tea after a hard farming day?/Make A Cup Of Green Tea/614/-1/500/-1/true
Entries.5000062: ItemDelivery/Special Food In Autumn/Sashimi in autumn is so delicious that even cats who left home come back. Linus wants two fresh Shad for his special autumn dish./Give Linus 2 Shad./Linus 706 2/5000063/1000/-1/true/@, you came! Did you bring what I asked for?#$b#Shad sashimi is the food that I look forward to the most in autumn.$h#$b#Ah, I had a conversation with Robin before, and her son Sebastian said he really liked sashimi...#$b#Just wait a minute, buddy.#$b#Now, here's some fresh sashimi. Will you take this to Sebastian? I'm not really close to him, so he'll feel burdened if I bring it myself.[227]#$b#I want to share joy with my neighbors. Thank you for doing this for me, @.$h
Entries.5000063: ItemDelivery/Special Food In Autumn/Linus wants to share the joy of eating delicious sashimi with his neighbors. Please Bring the sashimi to Sebastian./Bring The Sashimi To Sebastian./Sebastian 227/-1/0/-1/true/Hey, @. Are you here to play?#$b#um? Linus wants to give me Shad Sashimi? How did he know I like raw fish?#$b#I didn't care much for him, but I feel like an ass now.#$b#I'll say my thanks to him directly next time.#$b#@, Thanks for bringing this to me. Let's eat sashimi together. [227]$h.
Entries.5000064: ItemDelivery/Winterization/When winter came, some residents asked Robin to check their boiler, and now she's in need of a lot of ingredients to keep everyone warm./Give Robin 50 Coal/Robin 382 50/5000065/14000/-1/true/Wow, that was quick! Weren't these heavy?#$b#You wonder what I'm going to use coal for? When I check the customers' boilers, I'm filling them with coal. haha.$h#$b#hmm...Now, if i have enough hardwood, i won't have any problems working on it. Please get me some hardwood.
Entries.5000065: ItemDelivery/Winterization/When winter came, some residents asked Robin to check their boiler, and now she's in need of a lot of ingredients to keep everyone warm./Give Robin 50 hardwood/Robin 709 50/-1/3500/-1/true/All right! I can start working right now.#$b#Hmm.. I'll have to check Caroline's house first because she gets cold easily...*Murmur*#$b#oh! I forgot to say thank you. You're a really good friend and neighbor. Thank you!$h
Entries.5000066: ItemDelivery/Bitter But Wholesome/Alex wants to make root honey tea for his grandmother who suffers from a cold every winter./Give Alex 5 Winter Roots/Alex 412 5/-1/1000/-1/true/Well, this root vegetable looks very bitter, but I hope it's that much healthier. Well, if I mix it with honey, it will be delicious.#$b#I hope my grandma doesn't catch a cold this year. I'm going to give her a healthy root tea every day.$h
Entries.5000067: ItemDelivery/Hot Mead/Pam is in the mood to drink some quality mead. She says she needs to drink it to get through the cold winter./Give Pam 1 Mead/Pam 459 1/-1/1000/-1/true/Oh, I knew I could trust you to get this for me! You're the best in town.#$b#Ooh, the scent of honey is really strong! This is a drink that even bees will love.#$b#Thank you, kid! I will watch TV while drinking this drink tonight. Hahaha!!$h
Entries.5000068: ItemDelivery/Squirrel's Emergency Food/Squirrels are starving because there is a huge shortage of acorns. Linus asked for acorns to feed the poor squirrels./Give Linus 30 Acorn/Linus 309 30/-1/0/-1/true/Thank you, @. Hopefully these will help the squirrels survive this winter.#$b#In fact, acorns are not a squirrel's favorite food. But when there is nothing to eat like this winter, acorns are a good emergency food.#$b#As expected, you are a really warm-hearted person. You helped me even though you knew I didn't have enough money to compensate.#$b#But... I want to give these as a token of gratitude. I went to the mine a while ago and found it. It's meaningless to me, but it will be useful to you.. Thanks again, friend.[60][62][64][72]$h
Entries.5000069: LostItem/Caroline's Tea Party/Caroline lost her favorite tea set. She only remembers having a tea party with her friends at the town hall./Find Caroline's Tea Set/Caroline 341 Town 60 11/-1/1000/-1/true/You found my tea set! Oh, my stuff was behind the town hall?#$b#I had my own strawberry wine while I had a tea party with Jodie, Robin, and Marnie before.#$b#I think we were all drunk and couldn't afford to pack this. hoho.$h#$b#It's my favorite teacup, so I'm glad you found it!$h#$b#Here, this is a tart just baked. Thank you for today, @[234]
Entries.5000070: ItemHarvest/The Biggest Egg in the World/Isn't it bothersome to harvest eggs every day and make mayonnaise? The ostrich egg is a very efficient egg that can solve such problems./Harvest 3 Ostrich Egg./289 3/-1/3000/-1/true
Entries.5000071: LostItem/Lewis's Concerns/Louis dropped a bottle of wine near the beach, and the bottle broke into pieces. No matter how much he searches, he says he can't find some of the pieces of glass. You'll have to find it before someone steps on it and gets hurt./Find Lewis' Glass Shards/Lewis 118 Beach 66 22/-1/1000/-1/true/Phew, now that you've found the last piece, I'm relieved.#$b#I've been worried about anyone stepping on it and getting hurt...#$b#Now I just have to remember to put the glass shards in a safe place...
